subject: Method of selection and selection criteria out of ex-servicemen sponsored by DGR for departmental fee collection
text: #rfv Tcny TrTHRf M1fetaroT PHXNE 91-14+50074100/50742 (Tsw; wat 3 TTAN ~AT) Fix 91-11-50)80*360/ 50804 National Exln. '2223/2318 /2468/25 Highways Auihority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) (i-5 SECTOF - 10, DWAAKA, NEW DELHI-1f0045 NHAI13013/22/CDM-CO/DGR 15.11.02 All PIUs/CMUs NHAI Circular no. NHAI/Commercial Operations/12 Sub: Method_gf Selection_and_selection_criteria_out_of_ex-servicemen_sponsored bY DGR for departmentaL fee collection [t has been decided that a locally constituted committee headed by the Project Director may judge the suitability of different ex-servicemen sponsored by Directorate General of Resettlement (DGR) for the purpose of management of toll plaza booths, by asking any relevant document considered necessary   including those pertaining to their experience and constitution and by an interview. The committee will take final decision in the matter and keep HQ informed.  Wherever, the Project Director is the only officer available in CMUPPIU, the committee may be formed with officers from nearby CMUPPIUs. Please acknowledge. fIMLohia) GM (Commercial Operations) Copy submitted to: Members / CGMs / CVO GMs at HQ PS to the Chairman N+A+
